metadata.title: CVE-2021-47322 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:NFSv4: Fix an Oops in pnfs_mark_request_commit() when doing O_DIRECTFix an Oopsable condition in pnfs_mark_request_commit() when we'reputting a set of writes on the commit list to reschedule them after afailed pNFS attempt.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
